name: Wunderland City - Darkness Inside
description:
This project was developed over four weeks (and a half day!) for the Horror Themed Game Jam 5 - "Alice in Wonderland" from March 11th to April 11th 2022.

Lots of work, about 400hrs, first three scenes are complete, but ran out of time, had an hour to submit it before deadline!

Still not as dark (in editor is much darker) as it should be, as having a problem with light maps/settings! :o(

Developed by myself with input from one other (to design/sound/asset choice who doesn't want to be named here!

Enjoy, comments welcome (be kind)!

Didn't get time to fully work out credits scroller so only shows some of them, icons for health kits and rifle clips, so u have unlimited ammo as ran out of time to implement ammo pickups!

And ALT F4 to Quit after main menu!

YOU WILL NEED A HALF DECENT GRAPHICS CARD FOR THE starting FOREST SCENE in the first part of the game!

Didn't get time to streamline the file size either, so it's a build with more stuff in
than it should, sorry (760mb aprox)!

Hot Fix:  Forget to add check for XBox controller NOTbeing present - now fixed!

Hot Fix2: Forgot to turn off directional light in two scenes, so now darker, altho light maps still not working properly!

Hot Fix 3: Running noise now fixed.

-------------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT NOTES  ON PLAYING!

-------------------------------------------------

DON'T FORGET YOU NEED TO ACTIVATE THE TRANSPORT "FORCEFIELD" TO GET THRU TO THE SECOND SCENE (COLLECT THE RIFLE AND KEY!).

SLIGHT BUGS ON SCORING SOMETIMES as SINGLETON not working correctly.

Didn't have time to rig weapon to animations, so only done to Firing Rifle one (I mean running with a gun half thru your head or floating in the air is ok isn't it?) Lol!

BIG TIP: PRESS "AIM" TO SHOOT the RIFLE, HOWEVER, AFTER FINISHED YOUR ATTACK, u should RELEASE "AIM" AGAIN, OTHERWISE TURNING WILL BE A LOT SLOWER THAN NORMAL!!!!

ENJOY, AND GO COLLECT THE WHITE RABBITS! I DIDN'T GET THEM ALL LOL!
